title: Jackie Evancho
summary: Jacqueline Marie Evancho (/iːˈvæŋkoʊ/ ee-VANG-koh;[2] born April 9, 2000) is an American classical crossover singer who gained wide recognition at an early age. Since 2009, she has issued a platinum-selling EP and eight albums, including three Billboard 200 top 10 debuts.[3][4] She has also been the subject of three solo PBS concert specials.
